verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>report<s%> of <S%H3372>thee<s%>, and am afraid: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2421>revive<s%> thy <S%H6467>work<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%>; In the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> make it <S%H3045>known<s%>; In <S%H7267>wrath<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H7355>mercy<s%>.

God <S%H433><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman<s%>, And the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6290>Paran<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>. His <S%H1935>glory<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, And the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of his <S%H8416>praise<s%>.
And his <S%H5051>brightness<s%> was as the <S%H216>light<s%>; He had <S%H7161>rays<s%> coming forth from his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; And there was the <S%H2253>hiding<s%> of his <S%H5797>power<s%>.
Before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H3212>went<s%> the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, And fiery <S%H7565>bolts<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

He <S%H5975>stood<s%>, and <S%H4128>measured<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>; He <S%H7200>beheld<s%>, and drove <S%H5425>asunder<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; And the <S%H5703>eternal<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered<s%>; The <S%H5703>everlasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%> did <S%H7817>bow<s%>; His <S%H5769>goings<s%> were as of <S%H5769>old<s%>.
I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3572>Cushan<s%> in <S%H205>affliction<s%>; The <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> did <S%H7264>tremble<s%>.

Was <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2734>displeased<s%> with the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>? Was thine <S%H639>anger<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>, Or thy <S%H5678>wrath<s%> against the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, That thou didst <S%H7392>ride<s%> upon thy <S%H5483>horses<s%>, Upon thy <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%>?

Thy <S%H7198>bow<s%> was made <S%H6181>quite<s%> <S%H5783>bare<s%>; The <S%H7621>oaths<s%> to the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> were a sure <S%H562>word<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>. Thou didst <S%H1234>cleave<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2342>thee<s%>, and were afraid; The <S%H2230>tempest<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%>; The <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> its <S%H6963>voice<s%>, And lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> its <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H7315>high<s%>.

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H3394>moon<s%> stood <S%H5975>still<s%> in their <S%H2073>habitation<s%>, At the <S%H216>light<s%> of thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> as they <S%H1980>went<s%>, At the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of thy <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%>.
Thou didst march <S%H6805>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H2195>indignation<s%>; Thou didst <S%H1758>thresh<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%>.

Thou wentest <S%H3318>forth<s%> for the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, For the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>; Thou <S%H4272>woundest<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6168>man<s%>, Laying bare the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> even unto the <S%H6677>neck<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

Thou didst <S%H5344>pierce<s%> with his own <S%H4294>staves<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H6518>warriors<s%>: They came as a <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> to <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H5951>me<s%>; Their rejoicing was as to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H4565>secretly<s%>.
Thou didst <S%H1869>tread<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with thy <S%H5483>horses<s%>, The <S%H2563>heap<s%> of <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

I <S%H8085>heard<s%>, and my <S%H990>body<s%> <S%H7264>trembled<s%>, My <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6750>quivered<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%>; <S%H7538>Rottenness<s%> <S%H935>entereth<s%> into my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and I <S%H7264>tremble<s%> in my <S%H5117>place<s%>; Because I must wait quietly for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, For the coming <S%H5927>up<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that invadeth <S%H1464>us<s%>.

For though the <S%H8384>fig-tree<s%> shall not <S%H6524>flourish<s%>, Neither shall <S%H2981>fruit<s%> be in the <S%H1612>vines<s%>; The <S%H4639>labor<s%> of the <S%H2132>olive<s%> shall <S%H3584>fail<s%>, And the <S%H7709>fields<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> no <S%H400>food<s%>; The <S%H6629>flock<s%> shall be cut <S%H1504>off<s%> from the <S%H4356>fold<s%>, And there shall be no <S%H1241>herd<s%> in the <S%H7517>stalls<s%>:
Yet I will <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I will <S%H1523>joy<s%> in the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, is my <S%H2428>strength<s%>; And he <S%H7760>maketh<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>hinds<s%>' <S%H1869>feet<s%>, And will make me to walk upon my high <S%H1116>places<s%>.
